name: Grep Search
description: Search for patterns in text or files using regex with Linux grep-like options

pattern.label: Search Pattern
pattern.description: Regular expression or text pattern to search for

input_source.label: Input Source
input_source.description: Where to search for the pattern

file_path.label: File Path
file_path.description: Path to file to search (when using file input)

count_only.label: Count Only (-c)
count_only.description: Return only the count of matching lines

max_count.label: Max Count (-m)
max_count.description: Maximum number of matches to return (0 = unlimited)

context_before.label: Context Before (-B)
context_before.description: Number of lines to show before each match

context_after.label: Context After (-A)
context_after.description: Number of lines to show after each match

file_pattern.label: File Pattern
file_pattern.description: Glob pattern for files to search (when recursive)

outputs.name: matches
outputs.label: Matches
outputs.description: Array of matching lines with metadata

outputs.name: success
outputs.label: Success
outputs.description: Whether the grep operation completed successfully

python.template:
# Grep node: {{nodeId}}
{{nodeVar}}_config = {
    'pattern': {{quote pattern}},
    'input_source': {{quote input_source}},
    'file_path': {{quote file_path}},
    'case_insensitive': {{case_insensitive}},
    'whole_words': {{whole_words}},
    'invert_match': {{invert_match}},
    'line_numbers': {{line_numbers}},
    'count_only': {{count_only}},
    'max_count': {{max_count}} if {{max_count}} > 0 else None,
    'context_before': {{context_before}},
    'context_after': {{context_after}},
    'recursive': {{recursive}},
    'file_pattern': {{quote file_pattern}}
}

{{nodeVar}}_result = execute_grep_{{sanitizedNodeId}}({{nodeVar}}_config, {{inputVar}})
{{nodeVar}}_matches = {{nodeVar}}_result['matches']
{{nodeVar}}_match_count = {{nodeVar}}_result['match_count']
{{nodeVar}}_success = {{nodeVar}}_result['success']
